    • Method Detail

      • setDesiredPreviewSize

        public void setDesiredPreviewSize(int width,
                                  int height)
        Select desired camera resolution. Not all devices supports all resolutions, closest available will be chosen. If not selected, closest match to screen resolution will be chosen. High resolutions will slow down scanning process on slower devices.
        Parameters:
        width - desired preview width
        height - desired preview height

      • renderCroppedGreyscaleBitmap

        public Bitmap renderCroppedGreyscaleBitmap(byte[] data,
                                           int width,
                                           int height)
        Converts a YUV format frame to Bitmap grayscale frame.
        Parameters:
        data - YUV frame from camera
        width - frame width
        height - frame height
        Returns:
        Bitmap the Bitmap object that represents a grayscale frame
